summary: Get OAuth authorization URL for authentication.
description:
Get OAuth authorization URL for authentication.

For OAuth providers (like Home Assistant), this returns the URL that
the user should visit in their browser to authorize the application.

parameters.name: provider_id
parameters.description: The provider ID (e.g., "hass").

parameters.name: return_url
parameters.description: URL to redirect to after OAuth completes.

return_type: object with string keys and string values

summary: Authenticate user with credentials via WebSocket.
description:
Authenticate user with credentials via WebSocket.

This command allows clients to authenticate over the WebSocket connection
using username/password or other provider-specific credentials.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username for authentication (for builtin provider).

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for authentication (for builtin provider).

parameters.name: provider_id
parameters.description: The login provider ID (defaults to "builtin").

parameters.name: device_name
parameters.description: Optional device name for the token (e.g., "iPhone 15", "Desktop PC").

parameters.name: extra_credentials
parameters.description: Additional provider-specific credentials.

return_type: object with string keys and Any values

summary: Logout current user by revoking the current token.
description: Logout current user by revoking the current token.

summary: Get current authenticated user information.
description: Get current authenticated user information.

summary: Get list of available authentication providers.
description:
Get list of available authentication providers.

Returns information about all available login providers including
whether they require OAuth redirect flow.
return_type: Array of object with string keys and Any values

summary: Create a new long-lived access token for current user or another user (admin only).
description:
Create a new long-lived access token for current user or another user (admin only).

Long-lived tokens are intended for external integrations and API access.
They expire after 10 years and do NOT auto-renew on use.

Short-lived tokens (for regular user sessions) are only created during login
and auto-renew on each use (sliding 30-day expiration window).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name/description for the token (e.g., "Home Assistant", "Mobile App").

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Optional user ID to create token for (admin only).

summary: Revoke an auth token.
description: Revoke an auth token.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: The token ID to revoke.

summary: Get current user's auth tokens or another user's tokens (admin only).
description: Get current user's auth tokens or another user's tokens (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Optional user ID to get tokens for (admin only).

summary: Get user by ID (admin only).
description: Get user by ID (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID.

summary: Create a new user with built-in authentication (admin only).
description: Create a new user with built-in authentication (admin only).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username (minimum 2 characters).

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password (minimum 8 characters).

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: User role - "admin" or "user" (default: "user").

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Optional display name.

parameters.name: avatar_url
parameters.description: Optional avatar URL.

parameters.name: player_filter
parameters.description: Optional list of player IDs user has access to.

parameters.name: provider_filter
parameters.description: Optional list of provider instance IDs user has access to.

summary: Delete user account (admin only).
description: Delete user account (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID.

summary: Disable user account (admin only).
description: Disable user account (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID.

summary: Enable user account (admin only).
description: Enable user account (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID.

summary: Get current user's linked authentication providers.
description: Get current user's linked authentication providers.
return_type: Array of object with string keys and Any values

summary: Unlink authentication provider from user (admin only).
description: Unlink authentication provider from user (admin only).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID.

parameters.name: provider_type
parameters.description: Provider type to unlink.

summary: Update user profile information.
description:
Update user profile information.

Users can update their own profile. Admins can update any user including role and password.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID to update (optional, defaults to current user).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: New username (optional).

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: New display name (optional).

parameters.name: avatar_url
parameters.description: New avatar URL (optional).

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: New password (optional, minimum 8 characters).

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: New role - "admin" or "user" (optional, set by admin only).

parameters.name: preferences
parameters.type: object with string keys and Any values
parameters.description: User preferences dict (completely replaces existing, optional).

parameters.name: player_filter
parameters.description: List of player IDs user has access to (set by admin only, optional).

parameters.name: provider_filter
parameters.description: List of provider instance IDs user has access to (set by admin only, optional).

summary: Get all users (admin only).
description:
Get all users (admin only).

System users are excluded from the list.

summary: Return all core controllers config options.

parameters.description: Optional default value to return if key is not found.

This method will validate the config and apply it to the player.

summary: Get lyrics for given track from metadata providers.
description:
Get lyrics for given track from metadata providers.

Returns a tuple of (lyrics, lrc_lyrics) if found.

summary: Set the default preferred language.
description:
Set the default preferred language.

Reasoning behind this is that the backend can not make a wise choice for the default,
so relies on some external source that knows better to set this info, like the frontend
or a streaming provider.
Can only be set once (by this call or the user).

summary: Set the preferred language.
description:
Set the preferred language.

Note that this will not modify any existing metadata,
but will be used for future lookups.

parameters.name: radio_mode
parameters.description: Enable radio mode for the given item(s).

parameters.name: start_item
parameters.description: Optional item to start the playlist or album from.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user requesting the playback. Setting the username allows for overriding the logged-in user to account for playback history per user when the play_media is called from a shared context (like a web hook or automation).

summary: Toggle play/pause on given playerqueue.
description: Toggle play/pause on given playerqueue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the queue to handle the command.

summary: Handle PREVIOUS TRACK command for given queue.
description: Handle PREVIOUS TRACK command for given queue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the queue to handle the command.

summary: Configure repeat setting on the the queue.
description: Configure repeat setting on the the queue.

summary: Handle RESUME command for given queue.
description: Handle RESUME command for given queue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the queue to handle the command.

summary: Handle SEEK command for given queue.
description: Handle SEEK command for given queue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the queue to handle the command.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: position in seconds to seek to in the current playing item.

summary: Configure shuffle setting on the the queue.
description: Configure shuffle setting on the the queue.

summary: Handle SKIP command for given queue.
description: Handle SKIP command for given queue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the queue to handle the command.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: number of seconds to skip in track. Use negative value to skip back.

summary: Handle STOP command for given queue.
description: Handle STOP command for given queue.

parameters.name: queue_id
parameters.description: queue_id of the playerqueue to handle the command.

summary: Transfer queue to another queue.
description: Transfer queue to another queue.

summary: Add the currently playing item/track on given player to the favorites.
description:
Add the currently playing item/track on given player to the favorites.

This tries to resolve the currently playing media to an actual media item
and add that to the favorites in the library.

Will raise an error if the player is not currently playing anything
or if the currently playing media can not be resolved to a media item.

summary: Return PlayerState for all registered players.
description: Return PlayerState for all registered players.

summary: Handle GROUP command for given player.
description:
Handle GROUP command for given player.

Join/add the given player(id) to the given (leader) player/sync group.
If the target player itself is already synced to another player, this may fail.
If the player can not be synced with the given target player, this may fail.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

parameters.name: target_player
parameters.description: player_id of the syncgroup leader or group player.

summary: Join given player(s) to target player.
description:
Join given player(s) to target player.

Will add the given player(s) to the target player (sync leader or group player).
NOTE: This is a (deprecated) alias for cmd_set_members.

summary: Handle adjusting the overall/group volume to a playergroup (or synced players).
description:
Handle adjusting the overall/group volume to a playergroup (or synced players).

Will set a new (overall) volume level to a group player or syncgroup.

parameters.name: volume_level
parameters.description: volume level (0..100) to set to the group.

summary: Send VOLUME_DOWN command to given playergroup.
description: Send VOLUME_DOWN command to given playergroup.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

description: Send VOLUME_UP command to given playergroup.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

summary: Handle playback of an announcement (url) on given player.
description: Handle playback of an announcement (url) on given player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the announcement to play.

parameters.name: pre_announce
parameters.description: optional bool if pre-announce should be used.

parameters.name: volume_level
parameters.description: optional volume level to set for the announcement.

parameters.name: pre_announce_url
parameters.description: optional custom URL to use for the pre-announce chime.

summary: Toggle play/pause on given player.
description: Toggle play/pause on given player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

summary: Send POWER command to given player.
description: Send POWER command to given player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

parameters.name: powered
parameters.description: bool if player should be powered on or off.

description: Handle PREVIOUS TRACK command for given player.

Resume (or restart) playback on the player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Optional source to resume.

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Optional media to resume.

summary: Join/unjoin given player(s) to/from target player.
description:
Join/unjoin given player(s) to/from target player.

Will add the given player(s) to the target player (sync leader or group player).

parameters.name: target_player
parameters.description: player_id of the syncgroup leader or group player.

parameters.name: player_ids_to_add
parameters.description: List of player_id's to add to the target player.

parameters.name: player_ids_to_remove
parameters.description: List of player_id's to remove from the target player.

summary: Send STOP command to given player.
description: Send STOP command to given player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: player_id of the player to handle the command.

summary: Handle UNGROUP command for given player.
description:
Handle UNGROUP command for given player.

Remove the given player from any (sync)groups it currently is synced to.
If the player is not currently grouped to any other player,
this will silently be ignored.

NOTE: This is a (deprecated) alias for cmd_set_members.

summary: Handle UNGROUP command for all the given players.
description: Handle UNGROUP command for all the given players.

parameters.description: Name of the new group player

parameters.name: dynamic
parameters.description: Whether the group is dynamic (members can change)

summary: Remove a player from a provider.

Remove a player from a provider.

Can only be called when a PlayerProvider supports ProviderFeature.REMOVE_PLAYER.

description: Remove a group player.

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: ID of the group player to remove.

summary: Return all loaded/running Providers (instances).
description:
Return all loaded/running Providers (instances).

Optionally filtered by ProviderType.
Note that this applies user filters for music providers (for non admin users).

summary: Return all Provider manifests.
description: Return all Provider manifests.

description: Return Provider manifests of single provider(domain).
